product_name: One Way Telescopic Cross-Country Poles - Pair
long_description: Take the OneWay Telescopic cross-country ski poles along on your off-trail adventures in fresh snow. Aluminum alloy shafts are light and durable; shafts extend from 120cm to 165cm and feature clasps that secure the poles at your desired length. Include EVA grips and adjustable wrist straps. OneWay Telescopic cross-country ski poles come with 50mm-diameter touring baskets, 90mm-diameter powder baskets and rubber walking pads.
short_description: Take the OneWay Telescopic cross-country ski poles along on your off-trail adventures in fresh snow.
